yid bde ba skyes par rig nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'di ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang / /de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang / /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la 'ang / /gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir/ /nga ci 'dra bar de bzhin 'gyur/ /

dge slong dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang / /de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang / /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang / /gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir/ /nga ci 'dra bar de bzhin 'gyur/ /zhes

tshigs su bcad pa smras pa de ni nyes par smras pa yin gyi legs par smras pa ma yin no/ /nyes par bstod pa yin gyi/ legs par bstod pa ma yin no/ /nyes par brjod pa yin gyi legs par brjod pa ma yin no/ /dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin

de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams las yongs su ma grol zhing

sdug bsngal las yongs su ma grol lo zhes nga smra'o/ /de bas na des gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang / /de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang / /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang / /gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa dang / /shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir/ /

nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur/ /zhes tshigs su bcad pas smras pa 'di nyes par smras pa yin gyi legs par smras pa ma yin no/ /nyes par bstod pa yin gyi legs par bstod pa ma yin no/ /nyes par brjod pa yin gyi legs par brjod pa ma yin no/ /dge slong dag dge slong gang dgra

bcom pa yin zhing zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba des ni gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang / /de bzhin

bcu bzhi bco lnga dang / /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang / /gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir/ /nga ci 'dra bar de bzhin 'gyur/ /zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras na legs par smras pa yin te nyes par smras pa ma yin no/ /legs par bstod pa

yin te/ /nyes par bstod pa ma yin no/ /legs par brjod pa yin te nyes par brjod pa ma yin no/ /dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya

ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba rnams las yongs su grol zhing sdug bsngal las yongs su grol ba'o zhes smra ste/ de bas na des ni gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang / /de bzhin bcu bzhi bco

lnga dang / /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang / /gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir/ /nga ci 'dra bar de bzhin 'gyur/ /zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras na legs par smras pa yin te/ nyes par smras pa ma yin no/ /legs par bstod

pa yin te nyes par bstod pa ma yin no/ /legs par brjod pa yin te nyes par brjod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi kho ra khor yug na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i lam dpag tshad gcig tu gser gyi bye ma bdal te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chus pus

mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khyab po/ /gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du chu skam zhing med par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang nas gling du 'gro ba de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam yin no/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos glang po rin po che brtag par 'dod pas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe glang po rin po che la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa 'di nyid bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang nas 'khor de nyid du song nas

khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do/ /dge slong dag gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rta rin po che brtag par 'dod pas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe rta rin po che la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa 'di nyid bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de nyid du song nas khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /bsdus pa'i mdo la/ ri dang skye gnas dag dang ni/ /nam mkha' lding dang nyo tshong dang / /grang ba dag ni lnga par byas/ /dus tshigs kyang ni tha ma yin/ /'jig rten gzhag pa las tshigs drug pa'o/ /mdo la/ /srung ma lha'i grong khyer srang rnams rgyal

byed pa/ /chos bzangs rgyu ba'i lam dang 'obs dang skyed mos tshal/ /sa gzhi dang ni yongs 'du rdo dang glang chen rnams/ /lha ma yin rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra ba yin/ /lha'i grong khyer dang lha ma yin gyi grong gi bar du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srung ma rnam pa lnga bkod

pa la 'di lta ste/ chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang / phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / rtag tu myos kyi lha rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams so/ /gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lhan cig tu

g.yul 'gyed par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go cha gyon no/ /go cha rnam pa bzhi gyon pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang /

dngul las byas pa dang / be+e DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so/ /go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha bzhi la 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung

dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams so/ /mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung ngo / /lha ma yin de dag gi dpung gi tshogs yan lag

bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha bgos te/ go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/

mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung ba de dag chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis mthong ngo / /mthong nas chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyang dpung gi

tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyang go cha bgos te go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be+e DUr+ya las byas pa

dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs te/ lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /der ji ste klu rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham par gyur na ni klu rnams

kyis lha ma yin thub cing rdugs par byas te pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ klu rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srung ma dang po klu

rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas nas rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ rgya mtsho chen po nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim dang po gang na lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams 'khod par brje zhing 'gro'o/ /de nas lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chu na gnas

pa'i klu rnams dang / srung ma gnyis gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma yin dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /der ji ste srung ma gnyis rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ srung ma gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab

kyis phyogs par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srung ma gnyis pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srung ma gnyis lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par

byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim dang po nas bang rim gnyis pa lag na phreng thogs kyi lha rnams 'khod par brje zhing 'gro'o/ /de nas phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srung ma gsum po rnams

gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /der ji ste srung ma gsum po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni srung ma gsum po dag gis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis

phyogs par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srung ma gsum po rnams pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srung ma gsum po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab

kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gnyis pa nas bang rim gsum pa gang na rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams 'khod par brje zhing 'gro'o/ /de nas rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chu na

gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srung ma rnam pa bzhi po rnams gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /der ji ste srung ma bzhi po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni srung ma bzhi po rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs

par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srung ma bzhi po rnams pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi srung ma bzhi po dag lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham

par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gsum pa nas bang rim bzhi pa gang na rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams 'khod par brje zhing 'gro'o/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang

lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srung ma lnga po rnams gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /de ji ste srung ma lnga po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni srung ma lnga po rnams kyis lha ma yin

rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te srung ma lnga po rnams pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srung ma lnga bo rnams lha

ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim bzhi pa nas steng gi gzhi gang na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khod par brje zhing 'gro'o/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi lha rnams

kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka gang bdag cag srung ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas ri'i

rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gyi steng gi gzhir brjes te mchis par mkhyen par mdzod cig /kau shi ka da ltar gang gi dus la bab par dgongs shig /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs

po dag gang srung ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas shing ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhir brjes te/ 'ongs pa shes par gyis shig /grogs po dag da ltar gang gi dus la bab pa soms shig

de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa la bsams so/ /de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi mtshan mo rtogs nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskum pa las brkyang pa 'am/ brkyang ba las

bskum pa bzhin du glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa 'dzam bu'i gling nas mi snang bar byas te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song ngo / /song nas mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par sprul te/ mgo re re la mche ba drug drug /mche ba re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu

re re la pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la sil snyan bdun bdun mngon par sprul te/ mgo de dag thams cad kyi nang na khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa

de la lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhon no/ /de las gzhan pa'i mgo lhag ma rnams la ni nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhon no/ /de las gzhan pa'i glang po che rnams la ni de las gzhan pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams zhon no/ /de shin tu mgyogs te/ dper na 'jig

pa'i rlung ngam/ 'chags pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de ltar na lha 'am lha'i bu mo su yang 'di skad du 'di ni bdag gi mdun du 'gro'o zhe'am phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa med do/ /de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer lho phyogs kyi sgo nas

byung ste/ de nas skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du phyin nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de btang ste/ 'di lta ste lha'am/ lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu lha'i 'dod

pa'i yon tan lnga la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do/ /rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo / /ji tsam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de tsam du lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur

la/ sems kyang rtsub bar 'gyur te/ de dag lus rtsub pa dang / sems rtsub pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la mngon bar mos par gyur nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs

rnams go cha gyon te/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyi go cha rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel

las byas pa rnams bgos so/ /mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams so/ /mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs nas lha ma yin rnams

dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na ba der phyir ldog go/ /'on

kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed nas der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams

dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /ji ste lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir

ldog go/ /'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du stegs pa las na yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyir

log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /ji ste lha ma yin rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go/ /

lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so/ /'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi brdzi bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams ni lha'i grong khyer na

'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis der mi brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go/ /ji ste lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham

par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ /'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ de ltar lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag

gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog te/ lha rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do/ /ji ste lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lham yin rnams pham na ni lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub

cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ /'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di

ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas lha ma yin rnams phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /ji ste lan gsum du lha rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni

lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go/ /lha ma yin gyi grong du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad do/ /lha ma yin rnams la lha rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing

skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so/ /'on kyang lha rnams kyis der mi brdzi bzhin du lha rnams kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams ni lham yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der mi

brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs

par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ /'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di

dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do shes nas lha rnams phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /ji ste lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin

rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ /'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/

'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /dge slong dag ji ste lha ma yin rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/

lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha'i grong khyer mchog tu 'jug go/ /lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad do/ /lha rnams la lha ma yin rnams kyis mi

tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so/ /'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi brdzi bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams ni lha'i grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/

bdag cag gis ni der mi brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go/ /dge slong dag 'di ltar snga ma 'das pa'i dus na/ lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa na lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/

pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ /'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi

bzhin du snyegs pa las na yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /ji ste lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams

thub cing rdugs par byas te pham par byas shing / rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ /'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha

'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir log ste lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ /ji ste lan gsum du lha rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni

lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go/ /lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha ma yin rnams la lha rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs

shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so/ /'on kyang lha rnams kyis der mi brdzi bzhin du lha rnams kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis

ni der mi brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de lta bur gyur pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du/ gang tshe lha dang lha min lhan cig tu/ /gnyi ga 'dus shing g.yul ni 'gyed pa na/ /shing rta pa ni nyi zla mtshungs

med de/ /lha yi shing rta pa ni mchog yin no/ /zhes kyang bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhi ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba chur dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya/ zheng du yang nyis stong lnga brgya/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad khri yod pa/

dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ gser gyi ra bas bskor te ra ba'i 'phang du ni dpag tshad phyed dang gsum yod do/ /ra ba de la rtsig skyabs rnam pa bzhi las byas pa yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas

pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so/ /gyen du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / thur du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / zam pa brgyud ma rnam pa bzhi yod de/ /gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be+e DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so/ /

de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes te/ bris shing legs par bris pa tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed de/

rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes byed de/ me tog man dar ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khebs te/ rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par bkram ste/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi mthu stobs

kyis/ /lha yi grong khyer dag na rlung chen ldang / /me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed/ /me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par dgram/ /zhes kyang bya'o/ /lha'i grong khyer de ni sgo stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba yod do/ /sgo gcig gi yang 'phang du ni dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/

zheng du ni dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod do/ /sgo re re la yang skar ma'i gzugs su byas pa bzhi bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so/ /zla ba phyed pa lta bur yongs su grub pa dang /

ba lang gi mgo lta bu dang / me long rnams kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa bzhi yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yin no/ /sgo re re la yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams srung

ba'i phyir dang / bsgrub pa'i phyir dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir srung ma go cha bgos shing mtshon cha thogs pa lnga brgya bkod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lam srang srid du dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya yod la zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod do/ /dbyibs legs

shing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod do/ /srang de'i glo g.yas g.yon na rdzing bu byas pa'i rdzing bu de dag gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha

gu rnam pa bzhi brtsigs so/ /rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhi na them skas byas pa yod de/ them skas de dag 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhi brtsigs so/ /rdzing bu

de dag gi lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa bzhi kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi gtan ma dang / gdang bu dang gzungs gzer ni dngul las byas so/ /dngul gyi ni gser las byas so/ /bai DUr+ya'i

shel las byas so/ /shel gyi lan kan gyi gtan ma dang / gdong bu dang / gzungs gzer ni bai DUr+ya las byas te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes so/ /rdzing bu de dag kyang chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang /

pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs te/ de dag la ni chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin no/ /rdzing bu de dag gi nye

'khor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub ste/ me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dang / me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la

brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to/ /de dag gi nye 'khor na

dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /

dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do/ /lha'am lha'i bu mo dag gis ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /rol

mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud

rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do/ /yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / /ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams bud med kyi tshogs

kyis mdzes par byas shing lha'i bu mo mang pos brten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang btung ba dag kyang yod do/ /de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang

bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do/ /rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // //'jig rten gzhag pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ lha'i grong khyer gyi nang na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba chur dpag tshad nyis

brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ /mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod do/ /lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad phyed dang lngas gyen du 'phags so/ /khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba de'i rmang rten

rnam pa bzhi las byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so/ /khang bzang rnam par rgyal ba'i them pa rnam pa bzhi bkod pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las

byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so/ /khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i ka ba rnam pa bzhi gtsugs pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so/ /gser

las byas pa'i ka tan dang / ka zhu dang / bye phul dang / gdung rnams dngul las byas so/ /dngul gyi ni gser las byas so/ /bai DUr+ya'i ni shel las byas so/ /shel gyi ka tan dang / ka zhu dang / bye phul dang gdung rnams bai DUr+ya las byas so/ /khang bzangs rnam par rgyal

ba de'i phyam rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod do/ /'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so/ /khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la them skas rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod do/ /'di lta ste/

gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhi brtsigs so/ /khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas

pa dang / /shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi gtan ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni dngul las byas so/ /dngul gyi nyi gser las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya'i ni shel las byas so/ /shel gyi gtan ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs

gzer ni bai DUr+ya las byas so/ /bar gyi mdo la/ rmang rten them pa ka ba dang / /phyam rten dang ni stobs ldan phyam/ /'khor sa dang ni spang leb khang / /ya phubs dag ni tha ma yin/ /khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la ba gam brgyad yod do/ /ba gam re re la yang khang pa brtsegs

pa bdun bdun yod do/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re re la yang gnas khang bdun bdun/ gnas khang re re la yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la yang g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la sil snyan bdun bdun yod do/ /khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i nang na rdzing

bu byas pa yod do/ /rdzing bu de la chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod do/ /rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhi na them skas byas pa dag yod do/ /them skas de dag kyang / 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las

byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhi brtsigs so/ /rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhi yang lan kan gyis kun nas bskor te/ lan kan rnam pa bzhi dag gis snga ma bzhin du/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ bsil zhing chu

sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan

pa 'byin to/ /rdzing bu de'i nyen 'khor na me tog gi shing / 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog phreng bas bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog phreng rgyud

kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams

skad snyan cing 'byin to/ /dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang /

ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba dag 'byung ba'i shing rnams yod do/ /rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang /

'khar rnga dang / ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do/ /yang thog

rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing lha'i bu mo mang pos brten pa dang / sil snyan dang /

pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do/ /rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams

su myong ngo / /lha'i grong khyer gyi shar lho'i mtshams na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad sum brgya/ zheng du dpag tshad sum brgya mtha' skor du dpag tshad dgu brgya yod de/ lha'i grong

khyer las dpag tshad phyed dang bzhis 'phags so/ /lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs kyi sa gzhi dang / yang thog dang / ka ba dang / spyi 'dus kyi gdung dang / yang thog gi rtse bzhi dang / phyam gzum dang / phyam dgu po thams cad shel las byas pa dbyibs legs shing blta na

sdug la mdzes pa ste/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ /de la sgo dang / ya phubs dang / g+ha na dang / yang thog gi rtse bzhi dang / lu na dang / phyam dgu po yod de/

phum dgu po re re la yang ka ba bcu drug gis brten to/ /rgyu ba'i lam ni rim pa bdun yod do/ /de'i dbus su bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i ka ba zur brgyad pa/ gsal zhing 'phan med la rigs dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ skra'i rtse mo tsam gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i spyi 'dus kyi rten la mi reg

go/ /de'i 'og na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gser gyi khri bzang po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod do/ /der sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'dus shing 'khod nas lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / chos sems shing spyod de/ yongs

su rtogs par byed do/ /lha'i grong khyer nas rgyu ba'i lam srid du dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du yang dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ de'i glo g.yas g.yon

na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes te/ dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu

la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to/ /lha'i grong khyer 'obs bdun

rim gyis kun nas bskor te/ 'obs de dag kyang zabs dang / rgyar dpag tshad gcig tsam yod de/ pha gu gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis brtsigs pa na/ chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus

gang ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs la/ chu las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to/ /

'obs de dag na chu ka dang / rgyu mo gung dang / 'bru sna tshogs rnams byas pa dag yod de/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chu'i rtse mo la rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do/ /'obs de dag gi nye 'khor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs

par yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan

cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to/ /de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo / /

lha'i grong khyer gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs

shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba de'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod la/ ra ba de la rtsig skyabs gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi

yod do/ /gyen du 'phang ba dang / mthur du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / zam pa rgyu ba rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so/ /de'i nang gi sa gzhi ni dbyibs legs shing blta na

sdug la mdzes par bris shing legs par bris pa/ tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste/ 'jam shing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed rkang pa bteg na par zhes byed la/ me

tog man da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khebs te/ rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi rkyen gyis na/ /shing rta sna tshogs can na rlung chen ldang / /

me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor bar byed/ /me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems/ /zhes kyang bya'o/ /skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi nang na rdzing bu zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis

brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de yang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so/ /rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhi na them skas byas pa yod de/ them skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul

las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so/ /rdzing bu de'i lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ chu bsil ba dang / chu

sbrang rtsi lta bus gang zhing / me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan

pa 'byin to/ /rdzing bu de'i nye 'khor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog

gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to/ /dpag bsam gyi

shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi

yod do/ /rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do/ /rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod

do/ /lha'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do/ /yang thog rnams dang khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang

khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos brten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par

bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do/ /rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo / /de'i lam chur dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag

tshad phyed dang gnyis pa dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi phye ma bdal zhing tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa yod de/ de'i glo g.yas g.yon na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su

grub pa ste/ me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na/ me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /

skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to/ /dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam

pa bzhi yod do/ /dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do/ /

rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do/ /lha'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/

glang po che'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyi bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i bzhon pa la zhon par gyur te/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du dong nas rtse zhing

dga' la dga' dgur spyod do/ /rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo / /ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can na rdzing bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang / shing sna tshogs dang / lo ma sna tshogs dang /

me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / gos dang rgyan sna tshogs dang / lha'i bu mo sna tshogs yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ de'i tshe yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu rtse zhing

dga' la dga' dgur spyod do/ /rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na de'i skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya'o/ /skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sa gzhi bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag

tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun

nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi gtan ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni dngul las byas so/ /dngul gyi ni gser las byas so/ /bai DUr+ya'i ni shel las byas so/ /shel gyi ni gtan ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni bai DUr+ya las byas so/ /de'i nang gi sa gzhi

dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes par bris pa tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes byed la/ me tog

man da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub btsam du yongs su khebs te/ de na mi ma yin pa rnams rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams las kyi dbang gi rkyen gyis na/ /sa gzhi sna tshogs can na

rlung chen ldang / /me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor bar byed/ /me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems/ /zhes kyang bya'o/ /de'i lam srang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal

zhing tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ de'i glo g.yas na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na/ me tog phreng rgyud dam/

me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jibs pa dang / skad snyan yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can

rnams skad snyan par 'byin to/ /dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po

dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do/ /rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang

ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do/ /lha'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /lam de ni bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/ glang po'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang /

khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod do/ /lha'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyi bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i bzhon pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de la zhon nas sa gzhi sna tshogs can du dong zhing ci bder gnas par mngon par dga' bar byed do/ /de na lha'i drang srong rnams rang

dgar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /de bzhin du lha'i grong khyer gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ /chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la

dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ shing rta sna tshogs can ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyur

tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal na rdzing bu rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / rgyan rnams rtsub par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu mo rtsub par 'gyur ba rnams yod la/ gang

gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur zhing / sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ g.yul la mos par 'gyur bas na de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya'o/ /skyed

mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po rtsub 'gyur tshal bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa gzhi bzang po sna tshogs can na ji lta ba

bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /lha'i grong khyer gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor dpag tshad stong yod la/ gser gyi ra bas

kun nas bskor ba/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams na ji skad bshad pa bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal ni rdzing bu

'dres pa zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams 'dres pa dang / lha'i bu mo rnams 'dres pa yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal

'dres pa'i tshal na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang 'chol par 'dres te/ shin tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu rnams nyams su myong bas na de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya'o/ /skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i

tshal gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sa gzhi bzang po 'dres pa zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams na ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /lha'i

grong khyer gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag

tshad gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams na ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ /khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal na rdzing bu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang /

me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams dga' ba dang / lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' la/

dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o/ /skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sa gzhi bzang po dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig

yod do/ /chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams na ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /lha'i grong khyer gyi byang shar

gyi mtshams na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol zhes bya ba yod de/ yongs 'du las brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcu thur du zug go/ /'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya yod do/ /yal ga phyir gyes pa ni dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do/ /yongs 'du sa brtol gyi yal

ga lnga yod de/ yal ga gcig ni shar phyogs dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do/ /yal ga gnyis pa ni lho phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do/ /yal ga gsum pa ni nub phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do/ /yal ga bzhi pa ni byang phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do/ /

yal ga steng ma ni dpag tshad lnga bcur steng gi nam mkha' khyab par 'dug go/ /yongs 'du sa brtol gyi chur dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod do/ /zheng du yang dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod do/ /mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu yod do/ /yongs 'du sa brtol gyi dri

rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo / /rdzi phyogs ma yin par dpag tshad lnga bcur ngad ldang ngo / /dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na de'i tshe sum

cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma/ yongs 'du sa brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha

rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na ring po mi thogs par sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i

dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol sbal mig 'thon pa na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na da ni ring por mi

thogs par sbal mig bye bar 'gyur ro zhes/ kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol sbal mig bye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye

ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig bye ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs

'dus brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog gi kha 'bus pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus yang yod la

de'i skabs kyang yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog kha bye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di kha 'bye ba las nad ni ring po mi thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas par

'gyur ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma

thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri'i rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo / /rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ldang ngo / /dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag

sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcur thur du zug go/ /'phang du ni dpag tshad brgyad yod do/ /yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yan lag rnams ni dpag tshad lnga bcur gyes so/ /dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi

shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do/ /

dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun nas dga' zhing rab tu

dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pas de'i dus kyang yod do/ /dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol sbal mig 'thon pa de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par sbal

mig 'bya bar 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do/ /dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol sbal mig bye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa sum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di

sbal mig bye ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do/ /dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus pa nas de'i tshe sum

cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do/ /dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi

shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha phye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog kha bye ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing

rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do/ /dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri rdzi phyogs su dpag

tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo / /rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ngad ldang ngo / /dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ni lhang nger 'dug go/ /shing yongs 'du sa brtol thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i 'og na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba

bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo / /dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi mthu ni de tsam mo zhes gsungs so// //

bar gyi mdo la/ dang por lo ma ser ba dang / /de nas 'dab lhags sbal mig 'thon/ /sbal mig bye dang me tog 'bus/ /me tog kha 'bye thams cad rgyas/ /shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb yod de/ chur

dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang dpag tshad bco brgyad kyi cha gcig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes par bris shing legs par bris pa tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris te/

'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes byed la/ me tog man da rab mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khebs te/ de'i dbus na lha'i dbang po brgya

byin gyi seng ge'i khri bzang po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod do/ /de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhir lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag la 'byor cing ldan par gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las

kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo / /ar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb kyi kho ra khor yug na me tog gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa dag legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog phreng rgyud

dam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i

gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to/ /de'i nye 'khor na dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /dpag bsam gyi shing las

byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shar rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do/ /rgyan sna tshogs

lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do/ /lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbrang chang gi

btung ba dag kyang yod do/ /yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams dang / pra skan+da na ka rnams dang / pra tsa ra ka rnams dang / g+harga ra ka

rnams dang / bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing lha'i bu mo mang pos brten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan te/ de

na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo / /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pas srung gi bu zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta

na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod do/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog lta bur thal kar du 'dug la/ yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa ste/ de'i mgo bo dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar

la mche ba drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu'i srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ zheng du dpag tshad gcig /'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad bdun yod do/ /glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu'i 'khor glang po che brgyad stong yod

do/ /de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug cing yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas te/ de dag gi mgo bo yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes te/ sngo zhing srog chags lham

bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod pa sha stag ste/ gang gi che sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bus mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par sprul te/ mgo re re la mche ba drug drug /mche

ba re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re la pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la sil snyan bdun bdun mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo de dag thams cad kyi nang na khyad

par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin zhon no/ /mgo bo lhag ma rnams la ni nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhon no/ /glang po che lhag ma rnams la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams zhon no/ /de shin tu mgyogs te dper na 'jig pa'i rlung

ngam 'chags pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de na lha'am lha'i bu mo su yang 'di ni bdag gi mdun du 'gro'o zhe'am/ phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa med do/ /de nas glang po che'i rgyal pos srung gi bus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams so sor grong khyer gyi sgo nas bton to/ /bton nas so sor

skyed mos tshal du phyin par byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de btang nas 'di lta ste/ lha'am lha'i bu mo rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ lha'i 'dod pa lnga dag la 'byor cing ldan par gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur

spyod do/ /ji ltar brgya byin lha'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal po'i pho brang

'khor grong khyer blta na sdug ji lta ba bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yang grong khyer gser ldan zhes bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyi khang bzangs kyang gtams

pa can zhes bya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs zhes bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin gyi 'dun sa yang nor bzangs zhes bya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi 'di lta ste/ shing rta sna

tshogs tshal dang / rtsub 'gyur tshal dang / 'dres pa'i tshal dang / dga' ba'i tshal ji lta ba de bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi yang 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba rnams yin no/ /sum cu

rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sa gzhi bzang po bzhi 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs dang / rtsub 'gyur dang / 'dres pa dang / dga' ba ji lta ba de bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyi sa gzhi bzang po bzhi yang kun tu dga' ba ma dang / rab tu dga' ba

ma dang / dga' ba ma dang / dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba ma rnams so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol ji lta ba de bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyi shing yang tsi tra pa ta la zhes bya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ar mo nig lta

bu'i rdo leb ji lta ba de bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyi yang lha ma yin gyi rdo leb ces bya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pa sa srung gi bu ji lta ba de bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du

spyad pa yang ti se'i gangs brtsegs zhes bya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyad pa rab tu brtan pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyad pa yang bzod par dka' ba zhes bya'o/ /sum cu

rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can zhes bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po yang brag 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer ji ltar 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyi grong khyer

yang 'khor dang ldan pa yin no/ /lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin gyi rgyal srid kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /'jig rten gzhag pa las tshigs bdun pa'o// //'jig rten gzhag pa/ bam po lnga pa/

mdo la/ phyed dang drug dang thang cig mtha'/ /thung dang grang dang 'grib pa dang / /zlog pa dang ni bsdu ba dang / /phyogs dang shar phyogs 'du shes pa/ /zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha

gcig tu 'dzam bu'i gling las yol te/ rgya mtsho chen po dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig khyab par byed do/ /zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig tu rgya mtsho

chen po las yol te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig khyab par byed do/ /zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na nyin mo las thang cig re re 'grib cing / mtshan mo las thang cig re re skye'o/ /zla ba drug

tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na mtshan mo las thang cig re re 'grib cing nyin mo las thang cig re re skye'o/ /zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mtha' myur du spong ngo / /zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/

byang phyogs su 'gro ba na 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus yun ring mo zhig gis spong ngo / /ci'i phyir dgun mtshan mo ring la nyin mo thung zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mtha' myur du spong ba de'i phyir na dgun mtshan mo ring la

nyin mo thung ngo / /ci'i phyir na dpyid dang dbyar nyin mo ring la mtshan mo thung zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus yun ring du spong bas de'i phyir na dpyid dang dbyar nyin mo ring la mtshan mo thung ngo / /ci'i phyir dgun

grang bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na dpag tshad bzhi khri nas nyi ma'i 'od zer 'byung ba rnams rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pas gling rnams grang bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir na dgun grang ngo / /ci'i phyir na dpyid dang dbyar

dro bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na dpag tshad bzhi khri nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba rnams gling rnams su 'bab pas gling rnams dro bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir na dpyid dang dbyar dro bar 'gyur ro/ /ci'i phyir zla

ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi ngo tshes brgyad dag phan chad 'od 'grib cing kha dog dang dkyil 'khor chu zhing du 'grib ce na/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang nye bar 'gro zhing 'phrad par gyur to/ /'gro ba de rang gi dkyil 'khor las de'i grib ma byung ste/ des de'i dkyil 'khor

khebs shing de'i dkyil 'khor g.yogs par gyur te/ mi snang bas de'i phyir na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi ngo tshes bcu drug phan chad 'od 'grib cing mdog dang dkyil 'khor dang chu zhing du 'grib po/ /ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi ngo gnam stong la rnam pa thams

cad du mi snang zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang rnam pa thams cad du 'phrad cing 'grogs te/ de'i rang gi dkyil 'khor las grib ma 'byung ba de'i dkyil 'khor khebs shing des de'i dkyil 'khor g.yogs par mi 'gyur te mi snang bas de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi ngo

gnam stong la rnam pa thams cad du mi snang ngo / /ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshes gcig phan chad 'od skye zhing kha dog dang dkyil 'khor dang chu zhing du skye zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang 'bral zhing 'gro ste/ nyi ma dang 'bral zhing 'gro ba de rang gi dkyil 'khor las grib

ma chung ngur 'gyur te grib ma chung dur gyur pas de'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs snang bar gyur te/ de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi tshes gcig phan chad 'od skye zhing kha dog dang dkyil 'khor dang chu zhing du skye'o/ /ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la rnam

pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang rnam pa thams cad du bral te 'gro bas bral ba'i dkyil 'khor de las nyi ma'i 'od zer las gyur pa'i grib ma gang de'i dkyil 'khor la bsgribs pa de med par 'gyur te/ des de'i

dkyil 'khor snang bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus rnyog la mtha' rnam par dang zhing rnyog pa med ce na/ smras pa/ gling gi rten gyis de'i dbus

rnyog la/ chu'i rten gyis de'i mtha' rnam par dang zhing rnyog pa med do/ /gling rnams kyi gzugs brnyan gang yin pa des ni dbus rnyog la/ chu'i gzugs brnyan gang yin pa des ni mtha' rnam par dang zhing rnyog pa med do/ /gzhan yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na kun dga' ra ba dang /

skyed mos tshal dang / khyim rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams yod pas de'i phyir yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus rnyog la mtha' rnam par dang zhing rnyog pa med do/ /gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma shar ba de'i tshe shar gyi lus 'phags su ni nyi ma phyed do/ /byang gi sgra mi

snyan na ni nyi ma nub po/ /nub kyi ba lang spyod na ni nam phyed do/ /gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma phyed du gyur pa de'i tshe shar gyi lus 'phags su ni nyi ma nub po/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan na ni nam phyed do/ /nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na ni nyi ma 'char ro/ /gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na nyi ma

nub pa de'i tshe/ shar gyi lus 'phags gling na ni nam phyed do/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan na ni nyi ma 'char ro/ /nub kyi blang spyod kyi gling na ni nyi ma phyed do/ /gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na nam phyed du gyur pa de'i tshe shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na ni nyi ma 'char ro/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan na ni nyi ma

phyed do/ //nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na ni nyi ma nub po/ /ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thog mar byas te bshad pa de bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod kyang thog mar byas te thams cad brjod par bya'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi shar phyogs gang yin

pa de shar gyi lus 'phags kyi ni lho phyogs so/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi ni nub phyogs so/ /nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi ni byang phyogs so/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs gang yin pa de shar gyi lus 'phags kyi ni nub phyogs so/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi ni byang phyogs so/ /nub kyi ba lang

spyod kyi ni shar phyogs so/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi nub phyogs gang yin pa de shar gyi lus 'phags kyi ni byang phyogs so/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi ni shar phyogs so/ /nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi ni lho phyogs so/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi byang phyogs gang yin pa de shar gyi lus 'phags kyi ni

shar phyogs so/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi ni lho phyogs so/ /nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi ni nub phyogs so/ /ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thog mar byas te bshad pa de bzhin du byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phags kyang thog mar

byas te thams cad brjod par bya'o/ /phyogs ni bzhi yod de/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs so/ /shar phyogs la sems can shar phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can lho phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems

can nub phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can byang phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod do/ /lho phyogs la sems can lho phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can shar phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can nub phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/

sems can byang phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod do/ /nub phyogs la sems can shar phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can lho phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can nub phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can byang phyogs su

'du shes pa dag kyang yod do/ /byang phyogs la sems can shar phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can lho phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ /sems can nub phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can byang phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod de/

phyogs de dang de dag la de ltar tha snyad 'dogs so/ /'jig rten gzhag pa las tshigs brgyad pa'o// //mdo la/ zla ba nyi ma gnyis kyi tshad/ /skar ma rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /zla drug nyi ma 'gro ba dang / /gnod par byed pa tha ma yin/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ji tsam

zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu/ rngams su dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa shel

las grub pa ste/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor ro/ /ra ba de'i 'phang du yang dpag tshad phyed do/ /ra ba de la rtsig skyabs 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi dang / gyen du 'phang

pa'i mda' yab dang / thur du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / zam pa brgyud ma rnam pa bzhi dag yod do/ /de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ bris shing legs par bris pa tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris te/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam

pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na par zhes byed la me tog man da ra ba dag gis pus mo nub pa tsam du khebs te/ de ni mi ma yin pa rnams kyi rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni

'thor gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te 'di skad du/ zla ba'i bsod nams dbang gi rkyen gyis na/ /zla ba'i grong khyer dag na rlung chen ldang / /me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor bar byed/ /me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems/ /zhes kyang bya'o/ /zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor gyi nang na lam srang chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa cig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser kyi bye ma bdal zhing tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa/ de'i glo g.yas g.yon na rdzing bu byas pa dag yod de/

rdzing bu de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so/ /rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhi na yang them skas byas pa dag yod do/ /them skas byas pa dag kyang gser las byas pa dang /

dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so/ /rdzing bu de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i lan kan rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser

gyi lan kan gyi gtan ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni dngul las byas pa dang / dngul gyi ni gser las byas so/ /be+e DUr+ya'i ni shel las byas so/ /shel kyi ni gtan ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni bai DUr+ya las byas te/

dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsil ba dang / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs shing chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang /

skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to/ /de dag gi nye 'khor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur

pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang /

'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to/ /dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /dpag bsam gyi

shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do/ /rgyan sna tshogs lag

rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do/ /lha dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbrang chang gi btung ba

dag kyang yod do/ /yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo blta ba'i gnas rnams dang / zam pa rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing lha'i bu mo mang pos

brten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnams kyi sgra snyan par sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod do/ /de ni lha'i bu zla ba 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las

kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni ji tsam zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni chur dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig /zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig /mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gsum/ rngams su dpag tshad phyed dang

drug dang dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa shel las grub pa ste/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba de'i 'phang du yang dpag tshad phyed yod la ra ba de'i rtsig skyabs 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul

las byas pa dang / be+e DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi dang / gyen du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / thur du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / zam pa brgyud ma rnam pa bzhi dag yod do/ /de'i nang gis gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ bris

shing legs par bris pa tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris te/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes byed la/ me tog man da ra ba dag gis pus mo nub pa

tsam du khebs te/ de na mi ma yin pa rnams kyi rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang gi rkyen gyis na/ /nyi ma'i grong khyer dag na rlung chen ldang / /me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor
